biotools.summary: Bootstrap Elastic net regression from Time Series (BETS) is a statistical framework based on Granger causality for the recovery of a directed gene network from transcriptional time-series data. BETS uses elastic net regression and stability selection from bootstrapped samples to infer causal relationships among genes. BETS is highly parallelized, enabling efficient analysis of large transcriptional data sets.

bioschemas.name: BETS
